posts.author: Yunim
posts.content:
I believe that Shifter is a restricted class on Arelith so you might have difficulty qualifying for the class. Also there are a lot of custom changes on the server so some of the builds that are recommended to you might not work well on Arelith. It's probably best to ask on the Arelith forum for server-specific builds.

Risen Lord requires Shifter 10, Construct Shape requires Shifter 10 and 27 WIS. These requirements mean that you must be at least Dru5/Shif10 which only leaves 15 levels to work with. I think you can add up to two +2 bonuses to abilities with gifts, so Construct Shape can be achieved without any Great WIS feats.
For Risen Lord you can either focus on DEX for AC, CON for EDR3, or WIS for AC (requires Monk). For Construct Shape your main stat will be WIS, with DEX or CON as secondary abilities.

On some servers Monk/Shifter is nerfed so that WIS does not add to AC when shifted. If that is not the case on Arelith then I would recommend something like Dru14/Shif10/Monk6 or Dru11/Shif13/Monk6 for either shape. There are a lot more class options but that depends on what you want from the build.
